alert.note: Alert for Houghton; Keweenaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 05 at 4:08PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT KEWEENAW AND NORTHEASTERN HOUGHTON COUNTIES THROUGH 445 PM EDT... At 408 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Calumet, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Houghton, Calumet, Eagle Harbor, Eagle River, Laurium, Lake Linden, Hubbell, Houghton County Airport, The Upper Entrance of Portage Canal, Phoenix, Dollar Bay, Mohawk, Gay, Allouez, Delaware, Copper City, Ahmeek, Gratiot Lake, Betsy, and McLain State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
